entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Javascript RegEx could not be used in C# cause of not supported "--" in #79982
  • [wasm][nodejs] implement synchronous DLL loading #79981
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fails to serialize and throws internal System.NullReferenceException #79978
  • Assert "Expression: result >= val" #79977
  • System.IO.IOException: Unable to write data to the transport connection: Broken pipe. #79976
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-alpha.1.22619.1] When IServiceProvider parameter is null in ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() method, "Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'provider')" exception will be thrown #79972
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #79967
  • Fatal error related to static abstract interface methods invoked on structs. #79968

Closed

  • Calling a managed function within GC context results in "attempted to call a UnmanagedCallersOnly method from managed code" #79971
  • SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws fails in macOS 13 #77414
    8.0.0
  • MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse throws FormatException with null string #77160
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 12/11/2022 2:11:02 PM #79606
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete ProcessXmlBase #79980
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix WebClient url encoding regression #79975
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in WebSocketValidate #79974
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • enable SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws again #79914
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Remove null annotation from *HeaderValue.Parse methods #79950
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix condition in backport.yml to also trigger on schedule #79951

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Asserts for externaly configured assets, more pendingDownload #79886
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CompareInfo.Icu.cs #79787
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Use ArrayBuffer for write buffer management in HttpConnection #79525
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use ArrayBuffer for read buffer management in HttpConnection #79524
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
